people.title: People
people.noPeopleDesc: Add your first person to get started!

person.addSubtitle: Manually add someone to your network
person.name: Name
person.birthdayHint: Enter year only (1990), year-month (1990-06), or full date (1990-06-15)
person.invalidNameMessage: Please enter a name with at least 2 characters
person.nameTooLongMessage: Name must be 255 characters or less
person.nicknameTooLongMessage: Nickname must be 255 characters or less
person.errorAdding: Failed to add person. Please try again.

step1.title: Welcome to Friends
step1.description: Your personal CRM for managing relationships
step1.feature3: Never forget a birthday or important event

step2.title: Add Stories
step2.feature1: Record interactions as you have them
step2.feature2: AI extracts people and details automatically
step2.feature3: Build a knowledge base over time

step3.title: Manage People
step3.description: Organize your contacts with rich details
step3.feature4: Tag and categorize for easy filtering

step5.title: Get Started
step5.feature1: Add your first story or person
step5.feature4: Set up secrets protection when ready

settings.title: Settings
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the app's appearance by selecting your preferred theme color.

sampleData.title: Sample Data
sampleData.description: Add sample people and relations to test the app quickly.
sampleData.buttonNote: Adds: Emma Rodriguez (friend), Mike Chen (colleague), Sarah Thompson (friend) with various relations.
sampleData.successMessage:
Sample data has been added:

• 3 people (Emma, Mike, Sarah)
• 8 relations
• 1 story
sampleData.errorMessage: Failed to seed data. Check console for details.

highLoadTest.title: High Load Test
highLoadTest.description: Generate hundreds of test people with realistic data including diets, likes, dislikes, cares about, and connections between people. Perfect for performance testing!
highLoadTest.note: Each person gets: random name, job, diet, 3-8 likes, 2-5 dislikes, 2-6 cares about, tags, birthday (70% chance), and 2-10 connections to other people.
highLoadTest.confirmMessage:
This will create:

• {{count}} people
• {{relations}} relations (likes, dislikes, diets, etc.)
• ~{{connections}} connections between people

This may take a while for large numbers.
highLoadTest.successMessage:
Successfully generated:

• {{peopleCount}} people
• ~{{relationsCount}} relations
• {{connectionsCount}} connections

Time taken: {{duration}} seconds
highLoadTest.errorInvalidMessage: Please enter a number between 1 and 1000
highLoadTest.clearConfirmMessage: This will delete only the high load test data (people with addedBy="test_seed"). Your manually added data will be preserved.
highLoadTest.clearSuccess: Test data has been cleared. Your real data is preserved.

clearData.title: Clear Data
clearData.description: Remove all people, relations, and stories from the database.
clearData.warning: ⚠️ Warning: This action cannot be undone!
clearData.confirmMessage: This will delete ALL people, relations, and stories. This cannot be undone!
clearData.error: Failed to clear data. Check console for details.

foodQuiz.title: Food Preferences Quiz
foodQuiz.description: Tinder-style swipe quiz to quickly add food preferences for your primary contacts. Swipe right for likes, left for dislikes, down for unknown.
foodQuiz.note: Asks about popular foods like tomatoes, mushrooms, spicy food, etc. for primary people only.

partyPlanner.title: Party Planning
partyPlanner.description: Organize a party or gathering. Select guests, get seating suggestions based on their connections, and see food recommendations based on everyone's preferences.
partyPlanner.note: Creates an event with date, location, guest list, and AI-powered suggestions for seating and menu.

myPreferences.title: My Preferences
myPreferences.description: Track your own preferences, skills, and traits. This is your personal profile for managing what you like, dislike, know, and care about.
myPreferences.note: Add your food preferences, skills, hobbies, and other personal traits.
myPreferences.notFoundMessage: Your profile could not be found.

resetApp.title: Reset App State
resetApp.note: Shows the intro tutorial again on next app start.
resetApp.success: Onboarding reset. Restart the app to see it again.

aiPromptTesting.title: AI Prompt Testing
aiPromptTesting.description: Test and evaluate different AI prompt strategies for extracting relationship data from stories. Compare token usage and accuracy across multiple prompt variants.
aiPromptTesting.note: Tests prompt variants (V1-V4) for token efficiency, accuracy, and conflict detection. Results are logged to console.
aiPromptTesting.testCompleteMessage:
All prompt variants have been generated successfully!

Check the console for detailed token estimates and comparison data.
aiPromptTesting.mockCompleteMessage:
All test cases have been evaluated with mock responses!

Check the console for detailed results.
aiPromptTesting.reportCompleteMessage:
A detailed prompt variant comparison report has been generated.

Check the console to see the full markdown report with recommendations.
